mapper.update: update bank_car set usage=#{usage,jdbcType=CHAR},car_type=#{car_type,jdbcType=CHAR},car_media=#{car_media,jdbcType=CHAR}, car_grade=#{car_grade,jdbcType=CHAR},car_class=#{car_class,jdbcType=CHAR},car_name=#{car_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_status=#{car_status,jdbcType=CHAR},credit_grade=#{credit_grade,jdbcType= CHAR},year_fee=#{year_fee,jdbcType= NUMERIC}, attached_num=#{attached_num,jdbcType= NUMERIC},attached_code=#{attached_code,jdbcType= VARCHAR}, start_time=#{start_time,jdbcType= DATE},UPT_DAT=#{upt_dat,jdbcType= DATE},UPT_TLR=#{upt_tlr,jdbcType= VARCHAR}, USE_STS=#{use_sts,jdbcType=CHAR},REC_STS=#{rec_sts,jdbcType= CHAR} where id=#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.insert: insert into bank_car(usage,car_type,car_media,car_grade,car_class, car_name,car_status,credit_grade,year_fee,attached_num, attached_code,start_time,UPT_DAT,UPT_TLR,USE_STS, REC_STS ) values (#{usage,jdbcType=CHAR},#{car_type,jdbcType=CHAR},#{car_media,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{car_grade,jdbcType=CHAR},#{car_class,jdbcType=CHAR},#{car_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{car_status,jdbcType=CHAR},#{credit_grade,jdbcType= CHAR},#{year_fee,jdbcType= NUMERIC}, #{attached_num,jdbcType= NUMERIC},#{attached_code,jdbcType= VARCHAR},#{start_time,jdbcType= DATE}, #{upt_dat,jdbcType= DATE},#{upt_tlr,jdbcType= VARCHAR},#{use_sts,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rec_sts,jdbcType= CHAR} )
